data.name: Jam Studio VR
data.detailed_description:
JAM STUDIO VR

Jam Studio VR is made for everyone - no music experience required. Just play and enjoy. – no scoring and no judgement. You play what you want, when you want to, cueing the instruments by playing them. It’s all harmonious and musically appropriate, paired and ready for play with dynamic background rhythm tracks adding to your experience with musical genres including EDM, Rock, Classical, Pop, Jazz, Hip-Hip, Country and World. Create extraordinary music and play instruments used in rock bands, symphony orchestras, jazz combos, country music, unique instruments from around the world, and EDM music making sound effects and beats. Jam Studio VR is NOT a game - it’s an experience that lets you jump right in with no technical rules to hold you back. Includes 20+ interactive songs plus more available via in-application purchase. Experience it and Unleash Your Inner Musician!

Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR

data.short_description: Jam Studio VR immerses you in a world of music that enables anyone to create and play extraordinary music by simply touching and interacting with virtual instruments. Jam Studio VR is an experience that lets you jump right in and play any music genre with no technical rules to hold you back..
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Brilliant - this is all assisted stuff, no musical talent required, but boy does it make you feel like you have some! The VR options are nicely considerate to play space and making the choices is just immensely fun and diverting. We've had amazing fun with this, super creative and it's really great pass-n-play with mates too. I'm off now to buy the Phineas and Ferb DLC for my 10 yr old. Keep up the great start devs!”
Legoknockingshop

“Creativity without screwing up! This is a unique take on a music game that lets you create music but guarantees that it harmonizes. There's a huge variety of instruments and musical genres, making it a lot of fun to mix and match, trying out different combinations. It's fun to play and I really enjoyed the environments and VR elements, like the instrument selections and floating notes.”
wfthornton

“Jam Studio is truly an outstanding game. And I definitely recommend it to anyone that has a love for music. I play multiple VR games on a daily basis, and I got the privilege to beta test this game and see it improve tremendously over time. There is nothing better than kicking back after a long day and making songs and beats to all the different varieties of music this game offers. The instruments are awesome and look great. I usually play mainly action games but there's something different about this game that gets you hooked and want to come back. To top it off they have a minigame that allows you to play while listening to the song/beat that you created. The developers really outdid themselves with all the different features this game brings to the table. As I said before if you have a passion for music then this game is a MUST HAVE. Great work overall by the developing team.”
Ablaine19

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
